Author: MihailJ
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Arcona has begun testing its very own AR Viewer!    The Arcona team announces that the first approximation of the AR Viewer‚Äôs capacity is very encouraging and the system is passing through trial tests successfully!  Arcona AR Viewer is an augmented reality browser that will open amazing possibilities of the ecosystem to mobile users. This gives us every reason to state that the Viewer‚Äôs beta-version will be publicly released in coming December as scheduled.  The uniqueness of the Arcona ecosystem is in the combination of a few cutting-edge technologies‚Ää‚Äî‚Äätrending and widely developed each, but the most innovative and opening new prospects when put together. To create a convenient environment, the global AR layer, where virtual objects could be placed identically for all the users, we bet on functional integration and apply the following technologies: mixed reality, blockchain, artificial intelligence and neural networks, as well as GIS in tandem with SLAM technology. Last week the Arcona developers have successfully ported SLAM customized for the special requirements of the ecosystem to test iOS devices.  Today, only recognized leaders of the industry such as Google or Apple adjust SLAM technology in relation with augmented reality for their top devices. Arcona aims even higher. First, we reinforce SLAM with such a powerful tech combination, second, we work on the system compatibility with the user devices of pretty any kind. This is one of the main AR Viewer‚Äôs expected forces that differs it from all the rest products‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa stable work of the application not only on the latest models but also on the absolute majority of existing mobile devices. The algorithms that are being created will provide an amazing level of immersive experience for the users of a huge range of gadgets starting from cutting-edge headsets such as HoloLens and Magic Leap and ending with a veteran tablet.  Our coming demo is dedicated to one of such solutions being tested. Stay tuned and don‚Äôt miss the video coming this week! https://medium.com/@arconaico/arcona-has-begun-testing-of-own-ar-viewer-aa1fe77c98d3

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Make it fast from citizen to archont in Arcona!  Apart from being a rapidly developing system with impressive functionality, Arcona is the whole new world being created. This is a space where the reality we used to know changes beyond expectations and the most creative experimentation for business, education and entertainment takes place and fantastic new shape.  New world, new civilization, new inhabitants. There are more than 15 thousand of the ecosystem token holders and landowners, and every member of this community has his/her own goals and aspirations: some want to ‚Äúcultivate‚Äù the Digital Land, placing there own incredible AR projects, others are interested in building corporations on the basis of new technological resources, there also those who look forward to become the rulers of the new world. The good news is that everything is possible in Arcona. To ensure that everyone‚Äôs interests are taken into account, we have already started to formulate the first rules and laws of our ecosystem.  Let‚Äôs start with statuses. Every participant of the ecosystem gets the status depending on activity and personal contribution to the general development. What is it for?  The higher the user‚Äôs status is, the more privileges, benefits and opportunities to influence further ecosystem development he/she gets!  For instance, the holder of Master‚Äôs status will have the right to participate in private land auctions with exclusive conditions, to reserve any desirable land parcel, to order its digitization, to get the most tempting discounts on ready-to-use content and to have a wide range of other preferences.  Basically, every owner of the Digital land plot even of a minimum size will be able to manage and use this asset to the maximum, placing there as many AR projects as possible, lease the land or sell it on the Arcona Marketplace. https://medium.com/@arconaico/make-it-fast-from-citizen-to-archont-in-arcona-69e591518eae

Author: Alexbt
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Some details about the Digital Land processing  The Arcona Marketplace launch is scheduled for this month already, and we are truly excited about it! This stage is very important for the project, as our own trade platform secured by the blockchain tech will enable all the ecosystem participants‚Äô convenient interaction. It also will add value to the internal system token, before it enters crypto exchanges.  Once the Marketplace is on, there will be the first trial auctions held‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthose very auctions with attractive special prices which we have already told you about‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääfor the Arcona tokenholders. By this time, our GIS-developers will have got ready even more hexagonal land plots. Now around 35 000 plots have already been selected and stored for being listed very soon.  For our users, not really involved into Geoinformatics, it might be unclear how this land plots generation works. For instance, you could question a selective approach to this process. To put it in other words‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääwhy don‚Äôt our specialists simply digitize all the territory of the ten megacities? Basically, they do. At first, a continuous coverage made up of hexagonal shaped parts is produced and only after that a special algorithm selects the most interesting plots for future potential customers. https://medium.com/@arconaico/some-details-about-the-digital-land-processing-c724add6627d

Author: Jekwizor
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Some updates about the Arcona technical dimension https://medium.com/@arconaico/some-updates-about-the-arcona-technical-dimension-f8e2fd44ac03  Technical development of the Arcona project goes in several ways. We are keeping you posted about the Arcona marketplace news and telling you about milestones reached by GIS-department. Its high time to let you know about how the things are with the development of AR-content positioning in the augmented reality layer which can be accessed on location by using customer-facing app AR Viewer with mobile devices, such as smartphones, tablets, smartphones with AR headsets, standalone AR glasses and headsets like HoloLens, AR contact lenses, and others.  The Arcona AR Viewer is a free, cross-platform multi-user universal software program that enables participants to see augmented reality objects in a real-world environment.  At the moment the Arcona developers‚Äô team is working on the process of camera calibration and the detailed manual depicting the camera settings. For accurate positioning of objects in augmented reality, it is necessary to know the internal parameters of the camera. Focal length, angle of inclination of pixels (in most modern cameras is zero), the principal point (the point of intersection of the image plane with the optical axis), as well as distortion coefficients. To find these parameters for any specific camera, we have developed a calibration procedure.  It should be emphasized that this procedure is of great importance as most mobile cameras are notorious for the distortion referring to an image deformation, which is most pronounced towards the corners. Distortion is a deviation from a straight projection; in the presence of distortion, in fact, the straight lines in the image become curves. To get a better quality of what the user sees the device camera should be calibrated.  We have not deviated from the unspoken standards adopted in the environment of computer vision and use pictures for calibration ‚ÄúChess Calibration Board‚Äù. Our procedure is different from average one, because the board does not need to be printed on a printer and attached to a flat surface. Our procedure can use the calibration board image displayed on an average monitor screen. So, when first entering our viewer, the user will be asked to take a few images of the ‚ÄúChess Calibration Board‚Äù at different angles (with tips on how to properly place the camera) and start the calibration procedure, after the successful execution of which the camera parameters will be saved and the program will be ready to work. On subsequent runs, the saved settings will be automatically loaded and used.

Author: cashonly
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Today I asked in the project chat about this and that's what they said to me: "We produse a global layer of augmented reality that is automatically generated by the Arcona platform on the earth‚Äôs surface. The virtual layer is built on geospatial data and is directly linked to the existing landscape. You can use for tourism, marketing, sales, advertisements, organizations and events, games. If you can create the content or know someone who can you can make it! In addition, you can rent your land to other developers and companies and earn a profit by doing nothing! As a commodity, digital land is unique in that it is not land itself that is bought, but the income it brings. The higher the income, the higher the value of the digital land." I think Arcona will be especially popular in the field of tourism and games.

Author: Alexbt
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: The Arcona team is working on its marketplace https://medium.com/@arconaico/the-arcona-team-is-working-on-its-marketplace-ad23c8132724  The Arcona team uses the time of extended ICO to the fullest‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääfor launching a marketplace which is an integral part of the ecosystem. It is going to be a hub, uniting all the community residents and enabling free trade of AR content, software, services and surely digital assets.  Till the end of ICO there are just two options to get a desirable plot of the Digital Land‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääto win it in a raffle or to reserve it when buying the arcona tokens worth 50 ETH.  After ICO with the primary goal of introducing arcona tokens as the system currency, there will be the auctions for the tokenholder. The system currency will be used for buying the pieces of land. The next step is the opportunity to place tasks on the marketplace in an auction.  Trading within the Arcona system will be all transparent and secured by the smart contract allowing to identify who owns land or content, and who has the right to transfer it, as well as register all transfers. The technology of blockchain will also guarantee every content creator and programmer copyright protection and ensure automated payment for the use of their intellectual property.  Arcona will make extracting real-world value from skills developed in the virtual gaming space possible. This will give millions of people an opportunity to make a living in a world more populated than any other virtual universe. That‚Äôs what the Arcona team is concentrated on at the moment‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääto launch the Marketplace till the end of summer.  By far the web pages design of the Marketplace is drafted and the last touches are being put. The coding is underway too.  The initial content on the marketplace will include the following: Task packages: special packages with Arcona tasks for developers, 3D artists, lawyers, copywriters, musicians, animators, marketing and PR experts, and other professionals willing to contribute to the project and earn money from our system.

Author: d2s4
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: ICO Analysis: Arcona Published on April 24, 2018 By Ross Peili  Verdict This project of Augmented Reality is a futuristic concept that will enable us to experience different aspects of our everyday lives at any time, anywhere. It can group us with people, regardless of our distance, either from a business or an entertainment point of view. It can also bring us closer to other people‚Äôs ideas. It is easier to understand one another when you can visually witness what the other wants to show you, than hearing about it. When you can create anything you imagine in 3D for others to see, the whole concept of conception shifts meaning. Arcona wants to do the first step of reaching that level. With this project, 3D editors and animators will be able to create a library of every animation requested by people in Arcona. The more the library grows, the more people can express themselves through Augmented Reality. Augmented Reality has its positives and negatives, such as every aspect of life, and while the positives are many, there are a few negatives that should be mentioned. One of them is the excessive addition of commercial messages inside the cyber world, to the point that it becomes annoying or even unhealthy for the user. Another part that users should be careful is the addiction to Augmented Reality. It won‚Äôt be long before this technology is available in a variety of new devices, such as projectors on our sunglasses, for example. Users will be able to exist both in physical reality as well as inside a virtual lobby of digital content, and that can be either a gift or a curse. Risks From an investor‚Äôs perspective, the following facts are important to consider when weighing Arcona:     AR is a step ahead of VR, and VR is yet to be commercial. While we all enjoyed PokemonGo for a couple months, AR systems are still years behind in development and pragmatic real-life use-cases. -2,5     It may sound spooky, but being paid for watching virtual ads is really something we‚Äôre eventually going to face sooner or later. Creating tailored ads just for you to see in Augmented Reality can be almost unethical at the moment. -2     Many spatial locations have copyrighted content that you might not be able to pay for or even use in some cases. It might sound really interesting as a conceptual project, but in fact, it will be really difficult to convince governments to allow you to re-create 3D models of their societies and alter them on a digital level. Therefore we assume that in the beginning, there will be a preset amount of various locations to ‚Äúplay with‚Äù. -3 Growth Opportunity     On the other hand, having a decentralized multi-platform supporting Augmented Reality is definitely an aspect of the near future. Arcona is not one of the first, but the pioneer company behind this concept. +4     This Skolkovo-powered start-up is backed by Microsoft and Intel among other industrial titans, while it is also funded by the major ICO angel ‚ÄúWings‚Äù. These companies wouldn‚Äôt risk their name for something that has no vision. +3,5     AR can help us recreate historical events, and in a sense cheat time on a small scale. A whole new wave of tourism is here, where you can explore places literally built from scratch just to please your visual sensors. Not to mention how this new space could benefit the marketing and advertising sectors. +2,5     135,000,000 Arcona is a decent total cap for such a cheap token. 0.0025 ETH is currently equal to ~$1,60. Similar total supplies come from Binance and Nano, with their price per unit at $13,80 and $7,37 respectively. +3,5 Disposition Although it can generate interesting growth when it enters the market, Arcona will need most of the initial capital raise in order to headstart with a few outdoor parks, meaning that the price will most likely sink as soon as it enters the commercial cryptocurrency market. KYC (Know Your Customers) is mandatory for many, if not most, ICOs in order to secure the sales period by scammers and unwanted individuals. It is uncomfortable to know that a project so highly supported by various firms and governments is not using this simple security technique. A score of 6 out of 10 is reserved for Arcona, based on present facts. Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-arcona/

Body: Dear, Arcona community  Last week we were giving away the plots of the Digital Land in ten most visited and expensive cities in the world. We've prepared a few facts about how some users are fighting for the right to become the owner of such a nice prize.  1Ô∏è‚É£ Periodic purchases  We noticed that some users buy a certain amount of tokens every hour tracking rates. This strategy has already helped five users to get the Digital Land at a high rate.  2Ô∏è‚É£ Night investors  It's not a secret that the Arcona project involves the whole world, which means different time zones for the customers. And everyone has a chance to win a certain plot of land.  3Ô∏è‚É£ Pure luck  Just a couple of hours ago we had a real battle for the piece of land in Barcelona. Some people tried to get the land. Author: hufflepuff4life
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Hi there. We are launching an AR Viewer prototype in Q3 2018. The AR Viewer is a free, cross-platform multi-user software program that enables participants to see augmented reality objects in a real-world environment. You can read more about it here: https://www.arcona.io/doc/arcona_white_paper_en_4.pdf In addition, our platform combines features of distributed GIS, augmented reality technology, 3D simulation, AI and blockchain architecture principles. It offers AR project creators the simplest tools to bring their ideas to life. For developers, this is a good platform for testing new solutions and taking them to the market. For entrepreneurs, this offers an excellent opportunity to make money on AR or promote projects through AR technology. Thanks to the universal viewer of the platform, which is compatible with most mobile devices, numerous Arcona users will gain access to the latest ideas in the field of augmented reality.

The Piligrim XXI team is diligently working toward this goal. https://github.com/ArconaEcosystem/arcona-core + The Arcona AR Ecosystem is being developed by a professional team ‚Äì Piligrim XXI. We have 5 years of experience in developing AR solutions, and Arcona is the natural extension of our passion and experience in AR. Piligrim XXI has been working in the AR development market since 2013, enhancing tourism experience by providing an opportunity to time travel, to see how different historical places and events looked like in the bygone eras. In 2014, we launched the world‚Äôs first outdoor augmented reality park. Currently, 8 augmented reality parks have been sold and are operating in 6 European countries We have our computer vision prototype as an independent platform for AR. (Arcona.Core) Since 2015, we have made significant investments in the research of distributed GIS, augmented reality technologies, 3D simulation, computer vision and artificial intelligence

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: There is no need to burn tokens, they are issued for each purchase. Let me give you the example: Token sale is over, 50M usd hard cap reached, sold as you say 18M tokens, right? We consider all these 18M tokens as 60% then we generate rest 40% (12M tokens) It means that total emission will be 30M tokens and no more - and nothing to burn. We set 135M as max emission because you as the investor need to know what can be the final emission in any case, right? Because the price of the ETH can go up or can go down.  That's why we said that in any case, the final emission will not be more than 135M tokens.

Author: andrbutler
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: found this in the arcona faq: "This is a global layer of augmented reality that is automatically generated by the Arcona platform on the earth‚Äôs surface. It has natural limits ‚Äì 12 % dry land utilized by humans. The virtual layer is built on geospatial data and is directly linked to the existing landscape. Its basic feature is the capacity to remotely install and manage any content based on natural markers. The entire digital territory is divided into separate plots, represented by coordinates in the physical world. The owner of such a plot can use it as they see fit: implement own projects or grant other developers ‚Äì tenants ‚Äì that right. They can change the world on the lawn on their front yard or run a serious project on other content. A piece of digital land is a specific place in the physical world where you can attract multiple users ‚Äì viewers and customers of your projects. As a commodity, digital land is unique in that it is not land itself that is bought, but the income it brings. The higher the income, the higher the value of the digital land."

Author: LolaG
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Greetings! We are one of the first IT startups working on the international market of augmented reality. The Arcona AR Ecosystem is being developed by a professional team ‚Äì Piligrim XXI. We have 5 years of experience in developing AR solutions, and Arcona is the natural extension of our passion and experience in AR. Piligrim XXI has been working in the AR development market since 2013, enhancing tourism experience by providing an opportunity to time travel, to see how different historical places and events looked like in the bygone eras. In 2014, we launched the world‚Äôs first outdoor augmented reality park. Currently, 8 augmented reality parks have been sold and are operating in 6 European countries We have our computer vision prototype as an independent platform for AR. (Arcona.Core) Since 2015, we have made significant investments in the research of distributed GIS, augmented reality technologies, 3D simulation, computer vision and artificial intelligence

Author: wiserico
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Arcona has been added to  WISERICO tracker    Vote for the Arcona on WISERICO and follow Arcona on the  media platforms:  Telegram Twitter Facebook Medium   A blockchain-powered Ecosystem merging together real and virtual worlds worldwide creating an augmented reality layer. The Arcona Ecosystem creates a Digital Land ‚Äî a layer of Augmented Reality uniting the physical and virtual worlds into a single information environment perfectly linked to our real world. It is designed for everyday user interactive experience with augmented reality content in real world locations and change the surrounding real space on fly through the smartphone, tablet or with the use of headsets like HoloLens or similar In this Digital Land, anyone will be able to rent a land plot and start doing business within the AR platform. Everything will be controlled remotely, so you will be able to do your business worldwide without leaving your office What Is arcona token Token holders will bid on and own digital lots and receive rent payments when their lot is used by other AR programs on the platform. The Digital Land is the main asset of Arcona. You can Buy, Sell, Rent or Lease the Land and the 3D content using ERC20 token called arcona. Smart contract on blockchain, guarantees protection of copyright and property rights. The system automates royalty payments to content creators, and rents to digital asset owners.eposit tokens to create accounts, list and create financial instruments (FI), bid, buy and sell FIs, establish cooperation (trustline) between members.  WISERICO on BITCOINTALK

Author: piggyfrog
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: The idea to create Global AR Grid came to the team in 2014 when PiligrimXXI opened first in the world AR park on openair. To implement this idea we started development of our own platform, computer vision system in 2015 thinking that in 2020 AR will come to the mass market. In 2016 when appeared pokemon Go we understood that the community is more than ready for AR and they love it. In 2017 all the big players launched their own platforms, that they bought in 2015 like Apple did (bought Metaio in 2014-2015). Hardware is moving also. This is a very good sign.  Applying Blockchain we understand that everything can happen already in 2019 and we will be ready for that. According to the roadmap (you can see it on our website) we will launch the market place during the Q1 2018. Step by step we will digitalize the centers of the 10 biggest cities in which we will sell the digital land first, and in 2019 will be launched the platform. First cities scheduled to get covered with the layer of augmented reality are Barcelona, London, Mexico, New York, Paris, Peking, Rome, saint-Petersburg, Istanbul and Tokyo. While you have sometime, let's check out some of the figures for an Industry which is considered to be huge in 2019 - The AR industry.  https://www.vrfocus.com/2018/02/report-indicates-ar-could-approach-85-billion-in-revenue-by-2023/

Author: TOM47
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Arcona is the most massive AR ICO https://medium.com/@arconaico/arcona-is-the-most-massive-ar-ico-acbbf269963e    There is quite a frequent confusion in general understanding and use of the terms of Virtual and Augmented Reality, at least when it comes to the Arcona project perception. To make it clearer ‚Äúto whom it may concern‚Äù we would love to provide some insight.  So, Augmented Reality (AR) kind of adjusts real environment by adding graphics, sounds, haptic components and sometimes even smells to the natural world as it exists. Those augmenting elements are mostly quite apparent nowadays, but it‚Äôs just a matter of time, obviously very short one, when the differentiation and lines between real visual parts and computer generated details become totally imperceptible.  As for Virtual Reality, it gives the user a lasting feeling of being inside of some computerized imaginary world. Complete immersion is achieved by means of a headset and is nearly as real as being surrounded by habitual sets because of the world moving with the user.  Now when the basis is clear, we are getting back to the Arcona ecosystem which is a remote positioning and content management system for Augmented Reality. It gives an opportunity to embed the users‚Äô installations remotely in any location on the planet allowing to build entire worlds integrated into the real environment.  Our business model is based on the promotion and development of new technologies in the field of Augmented Reality for real life projects that include advertising, construction, landscaping and tourism. The technologies are based on building 3D landscape models via high resolution geospatial data, machine learning algorithms, the blockchain and smart contracts. In a few weeks Arcona ICO starts which is an amazing opportunity for everyone to participate in building the biggest community uniting the creative people, businessmen and developers.

Author: jscholz
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Arcona is a platform to allow people to build AR apps for any piece of land from anywhere in the world. So you can recreate the battle of Waterloo on the actual grounds. So people can go there and view the battle happening through their AR device/phone/ipad etc.  Kinda like Pokemon Go, only Arcona provides the platform for multiple apps.  Their previous company Pilgrim XXI has already proven that the system can increase tourism to particular sites, and have set up several AR themeparks that have generated income: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SwJ1kBraqs0

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: What do investors need to know about investing in the technology of AR? üèô‚¨áÔ∏èHere are a few important facts from IDC analysts.  In 2017, all IT giants participated in the battle on the AR market! The most powerful spurt was made by #Apple, introducing its SDK, ARKit and IPhoneX. Google released ARCore for Android. Microsoft combined AR and VR on the MixedReality Platform. Facebook and Snap prepared users of mobile AR platform for social networks. Even Amazon appreciated this technology for the development of e-commerce.  All in all, the year 2017 was particularly rich in new solutions for developers, and next year we expect a whole series of high-profile premiers in the AR headsets market and mainly in Magic Leap One. üìçIDC predicts that specialized equipment for augmented reality will take about a third of the market for points and helmets by 2021, which is about 30 million units.  Well, the main news of the coming year is the entrance of the Arcona ecosystem to the market, which will unite developers of augmented reality and manufacturers of headsets on the same site.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: BlockchainMix: How Decentralized Technology and AR will Change the Travel Industry in 2018  BlockchainMix - a hybrid of blockchain, augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) - appeared as a term in late 2017 at a conference in New York initiated by Arcona, a new project seeking to shape reality around the globe. Many signals suggest that 2018 could be the best year yet for this new trend, with the travel industry at the forefront of these emerging technologies.  Traveling is fun, but booking hotels, navigating your way around new cities and deciding on entertainment options can be a pain. However, AR can make difficult things simple, adding digital elements to ordinary navigation maps to help you select and find your destination easily. For example, with the help of select AR apps you can turn a subway map into an interactive one and follow trains in real time.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/blockchainmix-how-decentralized-technology-and-ar-change-travel-industry/

Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Seven Reasons You Should Invest in Digital Land  Real estate has always been a good investment, yet problems often arise when purchasing a plot at a prime location in a big city. A tiny piece of land in Paris or London is incredibly expensive and even if you‚Äôve got the money, practically all the top spots are already taken. However, buying artificial land in virtual worlds such as Second Life, Sansar, Decentraland or High Fidelity is not only easy, but also promises to be a profitable trend of the future.  Hundreds of millions of people visit virtual worlds every month. The market for in-game purchases has grown to $37 billion and could double by 2020. Thanks to Nintendo, Apple and Google, augmented reality (AR) is transforming into a powerful global industry.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/seven-reasons-you-should-invest-in-digital-land/

Author: hufflepuff4life
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Great questions and definitely understand your concerns. The Arcona Ecosystem creates a Digital Land - a layer of Augmented Reality uniting the physical and virtual worlds into a single information environment perfectly linked to our real world. It is designed for everyday user interactive experience with augmented, virtual and mixed reality multimedia content in real world locations. Land owners have the ability to outsource development of their digital property to developers to help build/decorate/alter their space to fit their needs. You can learn more about Arcona and how it all will work in the white paper: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qgIKDwD_w51SMpc-eHNTDgqfeN3eFT47yt6kn1kRebs/edit

Author: jscholz
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Think of it this way - everyone can see that augmented reality is going to be huge in the future. The industry is growing so fast. Arcona is setting up a platform to make it easy for everyone to participate in the augmented realty industry. Its going to be easier for developers to make their AR programs in any part of the world and get paid for it, and for participants to get access to these programs.  With things like Second Life and WoW there are a lot of ways that you can have an online community with its own economics, businesses etc. So there is a lot of proof that this sort of thing will work already. And with blockchain you know that its secure and you can trust that your money will be where you put it.  The details of how this will work are in the links in the post above this, but its important to look at the bigger picture as well!

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Hello and welcome! Virtually any projects related to augmented reality technology. These can be advertising and marketing campaigns, historic reenactments for tourists or art installations, educational programs or entertainment attractions, navigation services or quests. Any experiments with augmented reality technology will find their place in the Arcona ecosystem. The Arcona token is the universal internal currency and the economic foundation of the Arcona system. It will be used to buy items and pay for services within the system. The increase in the volume of digital assets bought exclusively using Arcona tokens will lead to the shortage of tokens and the rise in their value. Their value will rise at each development phase of the project due to the introduction of new technological solutions, expansion of the ecosystem, an increase in the number of members, as well as the volume and quality of projects implemented on the platform.

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Indeed! The market for augmented and virtual reality is rapidly growing and is now one of the primary drivers of the growth of the IT industry. According to Juniper Research, this market was about $3 billion in 2016 (AR ‚Äì $1 billion, VR ‚Äì $2 billion), and it is projected to surpass $150 billion by 2020 (AR ‚Äì $115 billion). The Arcona augmented reality global network, covering up to 40,000 km2, will be created in 2020. The primary mission of the Arcona ecosystem is to boost the growth of the AR industry. This will be achieved due to the fact that Arcona enables: ‚Äì to launch projects with different levels of complexity much faster and cheaper, which makes the technology more affordable; ‚Äì to remotely position and change projects without visiting the site, which eliminates all constraints associated with localization of technology; ‚Äì each user to set up their own projects without special professional skills, which will attract more enthusiasts to the industry and facilitate the emergence of a large number of diverse projects at different locations across the globe. Therefore, accessibility and remote management promote further development of AR technology and speed up its entry into the mass market. Therefore the demand for digital land is assured. And early 2019, when the platform intends to bring the first tested land plots on the market, the capabilities of our platform will raise demand.

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Reality-Clash this is more about the gaming industry, while Arcona is a unique ecosystem for augmented reality. The value of Arcona digital land lies in projects realized on thy physical lands. If they are really interesting and popular, they will withstand any competition. A piece of digital land will, therefore, have a higher value in populous cities with high tourist traffic, which is pretty much comparable to the commercial value of physical land. These popular areas, in particular, will be digitized first, by the end of next year. These comprise districts of the 10 largest megapolises with the total area of 1,500 km2. These will be: the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, the City of London, the Historic Centre of Mexico, Soho in New York, the 1st arrondissement of Paris, the Forbidden City in Beijing, the area around the Hermitage in St Petersburg, the ancient centre of Rome, Sultanahmet in Istanbul and the Asakusa district of Tokyo. Accessibility and remote management promote further development of AR technology and speed up its entry into the mass market. Therefore the demand for digital land is assured. And early 2019, when the platform intends to bring the first tested land plots on the market, the capabilities of our platform will raise demand. Arcona will organize different shows for different industries - we will use our projects in the tourism industry, real estate and advertising etc, we will create projects for big companies to show interesting it is for big players.

Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: A Cute Augmented Reality Angel Became the Face of Arcona‚Äôs ICO Campaign  Sweet Angel Eva, an augmented reality (AR) character designed for children, recently got promoted to lead Arcona, a new project that will enable developers to deposit virtual objects anywhere in the world. Her responsibilities include dealing with investors and the crypto community, as well as representing Arcona at a variety of virtual events.  Sweet Angel Eva was created in 2016 at the request of the main investor of Piligrim XXI, the company behind Arcona. Piligrim XXI has been developing AR solutions for the travel industry for more than four years. The company has already created the first network of outdoor AR parks with a total area of 12 miles in France, Italy, Russia, Latvia, Estonia and Bulgaria.  https://coinidol.com/a-cute-augmented-reality-angel-became-the-face-of-arcona-s-ico-campaign/

Author: paskal_navi
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Hi there, good question! ARCONA is a remote positioning and content management system for augmented reality. It`s much better than VR. You will be able to embed your installations remotely in any location on the planet. You will gain access to high-traffic locations, where you will be able to build entire worlds integrated into the real environment. This system will allow to use the real landscape and play real hide-and-seek with users. Soon, it will be possible to link 3D objects of any complexity with no space limitations at the click of a button. The Arcona ecosystem marketplace will be the hub, uniting all community residents and enabling free trade on AR content, software, services, digital land and more. The Digital Land is the asset of Arcona AR ecosystem. You can buy, sell main rent or lease it using ERC20 tokens called Arcona. Using Arcona tokens, you can sell creative software or 3D content to landowners and users, buy games attend special venues, buy professional services (coding, advertising, content creation) and participate in ads, promotions, special actions, games, and more all within the Arcona Ecosystem.

Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018

Blockchain technology can guarantee equal conditions and additional protection for the property rights of owners of Digital Land in the Arcona AR ecosystem, and protection of copyright for developers and living anywhere in the world. Every transaction in the system will be reliable, transparent, and mobile in the Arcona AR ecosystem. Smart contracts will guarantee every content creator and programmer copyright protection and ensure automated payment for the use of their intellectual property. Smart contracts will protect the rights of content and digital landowners.

Author: jscholz
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: Hi Gabi,  Anyone can buy/rent/build something on a piece of digital land. So as an example you could buy the piece of land outside your house, and then charge people to view any augmented reality program you build there. Or you could rent that digital land out to someone else that wants to build something. This is why some land is worth more. Because it is in a premium area. If you owned the land around the Eiffel Tower or near a historic area then you would get a lot more traffic through there, so probably could rent it out at a higher rate.  Hope that helps!

Author: thehun
Title: [ANN][ICO] ARCONA - Augmented Reality Ecosystem. Sale 15.04.2018
Body: WEBSITE | BOUNTY | BLOG | TWITTER | YOUTUBE| TELEGRAM | FACEBOOK  Local threads and whitepapers: Turkish - Whitepaper Russian Romanian Spanish - Whitepaper Indonesian - Whitepaper Vietnamese - Whitepaper Italian - Whitepaper German Chinese Portuguese   AUGMENTED REALITY ECOSYSTEM  A Blockchain Powered Ecosystem merging together real and virtual worlds worldwide creating augmented reality layer The Digital Land  What is Arcona Ecosystem  The Arcona Ecosystem creates a Digital Land - a layer of Augmented Reality uniting the physical and virtual worlds into a single information environment perfectly linked to our real world. It is designed for everyday user interactive experience with augmented reality content in real world locations and change the surrounding real space on fly through the smartphone, tablet or with the use of headsets like HoloLens or similar In this Digital Land, anyone will be able to rent a land plot and start doing business within the AR platform. Everything will be controlled remotely, so you will be able to do your business worldwide without leaving your office.  What Is arcona token  Token holders will bid on and own digital lots and receive rent payments when their lot is used by other AR programs on the platform. The Digital Land is the main asset of Arcona. You can Buy, Sell, Rent or Lease the Land and the 3D content using ERC20 token called arcona. Smart contract on blockchain, guarantees protection of copyright and property rights. The system automates royalty payments to content creators, and rents to digital asset owners.   What problem Arcona does solve  Correct positioning of a virtual object in a real place in outdoor is still an issue. The recent tech improvements from Apple and Google give a partial solution, relying mainly on the smartphone and its camera capacity.  Solution 1.Accurate remote placement of augmented reality objects in a changing environment. No GPS. - We use real world objects as a marker. 2.The ability to link virtual content with real landscapes anywhere in the world regardless of size. 3.A universal augmented reality environment connecting developers and consumers. 4.The ability for a wide range of users without any particular programming skills to create and monetize content within the augmented reality environment   5. You will gain access to high-traffic locations, where you will be able to build entire worlds integrated into the real environment.   Traction, Revenue, Milestones    The Arcona AR ecosystem is being developed by the professional team at Piligrim XXI.  We have 4 years of experience in developing AR solutions and Arcona is the natural extension of our passion and experience in AR. There are now 8 augmented reality parks and many other AR Projects sold in 6 European countries. The company‚Äôs revenue is USD 700K. Now our computer vision system prototype is ready as an independent platform for AR. Microsoft Seed Fund grant, accelerations of Intel and Google, Skolkovo Foundation, top 20 startups by Booking Booster Programm assisted in our job.   www.arcona.io Telegram: https://t.me/arcona_ico WhatsApp +34661849960;  Daniil Girdea  Airdrops  For more information about airdrops please visit the www.arconairdrop.com Exact amount of airdrop tokens will be based on the results of the ICO and will depend from the total emission of Arcona tokens and the number of participants of the airdrops. Total number of all airdropped tokens cant exceed 0.5% of total tokens emission.
